markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Cinder Rat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2981)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These oversized rodents are made of smoldering charcoal and elemental fire, and noxious fumes continually bellow from their flaming flesh. Even other fire elementals find cinder rats unpleasant and are glad when they're summoned away from the [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=31).

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Cinder Rat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2981)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 144 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), smoke vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The cinder rat ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

**Weaknesses**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5, [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) 5

**Fetid Fumes** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604)) 5 feet. A creature that enters the aura or begins its turn there must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91). Everything within the aura, including the cinder rat, is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) by smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 fire plus 1d4 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-410" />
name: Cinder Rat

Even other fire elementals find cinder rats unpleasant and are glad when they're summoned away from the Plane of Fire.
